title: Urinary tract infection

fields.name: hydration_advice
fields.label: Hydration advice
fields.default: Drink extra fluids over the next few days unless you are on fluid restriction.

body:
You were treated today for a urinary tract infection.

Antibiotics:
{{antibiotics}}

{{#if hydration_advice}}Hydration: {{hydration_advice}}

{{/if}}Return to ED urgently if you develop:
- Fever, rigors, or flank pain
- Persistent vomiting or inability to keep fluids down
- Worsening pain or confusion

Follow-up: {{followup_timeframe}}.
disclaimer: This letter is general advice and does not replace follow-up with your usual clinician.
